import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; export default function ProductCard({product, linkToDisplayPage, ableToDelete = false}) { let photo = ''; if (!product.photos?.length && product.main_image_url === "") { photo = 'https://st.depositphotos.com/2934765/53192/v/450/depositphotos_531920820-stock-illustration-photo-available-vector-icon-default.jpg'; } else { photo = (product.main_image_url === "") ? product.photos[0] : product.main_image_url } return (
{ableToDelete && Удалить } {product.category.category_name}
{product.name}

{product.description}

Просмотр ставок на товар
Цена: {product.start_price} BYN {product.reviews} просмотров
); }
